mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into orders (start_name, type, cost_price, sale_price, give_good, have_picture, phone, remark, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time ) values (#{startName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{costPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{salePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{giveGood,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{havePicture,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update orders set start_name = #{startName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, give_good = #{giveGood,jdbcType=INTEGER}, have_picture = #{havePicture,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, start_name, type, cost_price, sale_price, give_good, have_picture, phone, remark, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time from orders where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, start_name, type, cost_price, sale_price, give_good, have_picture, phone, remark, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time from orders
